sentence.Network_en: Louis Pasteur, French chemist and bacteriologist, was born at Dole.

sentence.Network_en: British bacteriologist Alexander Fleming died who discovered a powerful antibiotic, penicillin.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国细菌学家弗莱明逝世.他发现青霉素可能成为一种能全身应用的抗菌药物.

sentence.Network_en: Louis Pasteur ( 1822 - 95 ) was a French chemist and bacteriologist.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴斯德 ( 1822-95 ) 是法国的化学家和微生物学家.
